title: Ticket #4193: Have option to write job status file in classad format
description:
Brian Bockelman wants to use the job status file, but not have to create a new parser for it. So one possible solution is to dump out the node status in classad format.

I can see at least a couple possible issues with this:

  1. It will make the file bigger.
  2. If anyone is already using the existing format it will cause problems for them.

Brian proposed that we have a flag for whether to write the file in classad format, which would deal with # 2.
remarks:
2014-Feb-04 11:20:04 by bbockelm:
Has the file size been an issue in the past?

If there's 1KB / node, then even a million node DAG is a 1GB file. Certainly, you wouldn't want to dump that once every 30s, but that's not even large enough to trigger immediate disk writes on most hosts.
